Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. On his way to the airport, Sierra Leone Bill Clinton Ernest Bai Koroma said only that the talks will continue. Bill Clinton Ernest Bai Koroma : We have had very, very important meetings, following a mission from ECOWAS and the A.U.. At this stage, I can only say that the discussions are ongoing.
